      Creates a square stroke.

      Creates a vertical line stroke.

      Transforms the last specified stroke shape from a filled (solid) shape into an outlined shape.
      StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder.rotated(double degrees)
      Rotates the last-specified stroke shape by a given amount.
      StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder.scaled(double xScale, double yScale)
      Scales (enlarges or reduces) the last-specified stroke shape.
      StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder.sheared(double xShear, double yShear)
      Shears (slants) the last-specified stroke shape.
      StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder.stroked(Stroke stroke)
      Transforms the last specified shape from a filled (solid) shape into a stroked shape that is stroked by the given stroke.
      StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder.withoutInterpolation()
      When invoked, the stroke shape will be "stamped" only at each point where two paths join.
      static StrokeBuilder.ShapeStrokeBuilder StrokeBuilder.withShape()
      Builds a stroke in which a shape is "stamped" along each point of the stroked path.
